typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		COMPANY_NAME as string,
		COMPANY_ID as double,
		PARENT_COMPANY_ID as double,
		LEFT_NODE as double,
		RIGHT_NODE as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> CompanyBtree
source(output(
		COMPANY_NAME as string,
		COMPANY_ID as double,
		PARENT_COMPANY_ID as double,
		LEFT_NODE as double,
		RIGHT_NODE as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> ComapnyBtreeRight
